News.headline: Tickets: Lincoln City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Lincoln City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Lincoln City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Tickets for our away fixture against Lincoln City on Monday 3rd April are available to buy from the Daggers' ticket office
News.description:
We had been advised overnight on Wednesday 22nd March that our fixture against Lincoln City will be an 'All Ticket' game.

Please note that any supporters planning to make the trip to Lincoln will need to buy their tickets in advance of this fixture from the Dagger's ticket office.

The tickets for this game will be on sale until when the ticket office closes after our Vanarama National League fixture against Eastleigh FC on Saturday 1st April.

Away fans will be based in the Lincoln Uni & Bridge McFarlan Stand for this game.

Ticket Prices:
Adult - £16.00
Concession (60+) - £12.00
Student (Photo ID) - £6.00
Under 18's - £6.00

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Any fans needing a disabled/wheelchair ticket will have to pay £12.00 with the  carer going free of charge. Disabled supporters should have a medium/high level of Disability Living Allowance and any rate of PIP to qualify for a concession rate.  Disabled helpers tickets are only issued upon proof of a HIGH rate of DLA or ENHANCED rate of PIP.
